data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.                                                                                                                                                           
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=OL3adqFpNnoQ7kNvgFql6uP&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCLMare9xrZMgnCjQ_iURgGqB_GVQ0MitlfrYqZAT8Yfw&oe=66FD2CB7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=TjpUNFFsaPsQ7kNvgGb42kD&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAmx8YRwJi0zANHenWVJRFRAXtcDDXR3m_PTuJP_BNagA&oe=66FD3A52)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=LAdDS-4ymKcQ7kNvgGxVaO-&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDj20yqoL8_m_iS0INcCCPJ14M9oUBXLVj5oFnNcyw-FQ&oe=66FD2589)
